skills.name: Formula: Kienzle Cutting Force
skills.description: Kienzle Cutting Force. Equation: Fc = kc1.1 × h^(-mc) × b

skills.name: Formula: Merchant Shear Angle
skills.description: Merchant Shear Angle. Equation: φ = 45° - β/2 + γ/2

skills.name: Formula: Specific Cutting Energy
skills.description: Specific Cutting Energy. Equation: u = Fc × Vc / MRR

skills.name: Formula: Chip Thickness Ratio
skills.description: Chip Thickness Ratio. Equation: r = t1/t2 = sin(φ)/cos(φ-γ)

skills.name: Formula: Shear Strain
skills.description: Shear Strain. Equation: γ = cot(φ) + tan(φ-γ)

skills.name: Formula: Resultant Force
skills.description: Resultant Force. Equation: R = √(Fc² + Ft² + Fr²)

skills.name: Formula: Feed Force
skills.description: Feed Force. Equation: Ff = kf × f^xf × ap^yf

skills.name: Formula: Radial Force
skills.description: Radial Force. Equation: Fr = Fc × tan(β - γ)

skills.name: Formula: Oxley Flow Stress
skills.description: Oxley Flow Stress. Equation: σ = σ1 × (ε̇/ε̇₀)^n

skills.name: Formula: Merchant Force Balance
skills.description: Merchant Force Balance. Equation: Fc = τs × As / cos(β-γ+φ)

skills.name: Formula: Chip Compression
skills.description: Chip Compression. Equation: λ = t2/t1 = cos(φ-γ)/sin(φ)

skills.name: Formula: Shear Force
skills.description: Shear Force. Equation: Fs = τs × As

skills.name: Formula: Normal Force
skills.description: Normal Force. Equation: Fn = Fs × tan(β)

skills.name: Formula: Friction Force
skills.description: Friction Force. Equation: Ff = Fn × µ

skills.name: Formula: Total Power
skills.description: Total Power. Equation: P = Fc × Vc + Ff × Vf

skills.name: Formula: Taylor Tool Life
skills.description: Taylor Tool Life. Equation: VT^n = C

skills.name: Formula: Extended Taylor
skills.description: Extended Taylor. Equation: VT^n × f^a × d^b = C

skills.name: Formula: Flank Wear Rate
skills.description: Flank Wear Rate. Equation: dVB/dt = K × V^m

skills.name: Formula: Crater Wear Rate
skills.description: Crater Wear Rate. Equation: dKT/dt = A × exp(-B/T)

skills.name: Formula: Tool Life Prediction
skills.description: Tool Life Prediction. Equation: T = C / (V^n × f^a × d^b)

skills.name: Formula: Wear Land Growth
skills.description: Wear Land Growth. Equation: VB = VB₀ + K × t

skills.name: Formula: Notch Wear
skills.description: Notch Wear. Equation: VN = KN × V^m × t

skills.name: Formula: Combined Wear
skills.description: Combined Wear. Equation: W = √(VB² + KT² + VN²)

skills.name: Formula: Economic Tool Life
skills.description: Economic Tool Life. Equation: T_opt = (1/n - 1) × tc

skills.name: Formula: Cutting Temperature
skills.description: Cutting Temperature. Equation: θ = θ₀ + K × V^a × f^b

skills.name: Formula: Flash Temperature
skills.description: Flash Temperature. Equation: θf = q × L / (k × √(π×α×t))

skills.name: Formula: Bulk Temperature
skills.description: Bulk Temperature. Equation: θb = θ₀ + u × MRR / (ρ×c×Q)

skills.name: Formula: Interface Temperature
skills.description: Interface Temperature. Equation: θi = θf + θb

skills.name: Formula: Peclet Number
skills.description: Peclet Number. Equation: Pe = V × L / α

skills.name: Formula: Thermal Number
skills.description: Thermal Number. Equation: Nt = V × f / α

skills.name: Formula: Heat into Tool
skills.description: Heat into Tool. Equation: Qt = (1-R) × Fc × Vc

skills.name: Formula: Heat into Chip
skills.description: Heat into Chip. Equation: Qc = R × Fc × Vc

skills.name: Formula: Heat into Work
skills.description: Heat into Work. Equation: Qw = Ff × Vf

skills.name: Formula: Thermal Expansion
skills.description: Thermal Expansion. Equation: ΔL = L₀ × α × ΔT

skills.name: Formula: Tooth Passing Frequency
skills.description: Tooth Passing Frequency. Equation: ft = N × z / 60

skills.name: Formula: Stability Boundary
skills.description: Stability Boundary. Equation: ω = ωn × √(1 ± ζ)

skills.name: Formula: Theoretical Ra
skills.description: Theoretical Ra. Equation: Ra = f² / (32 × r)

skills.name: Formula: Theoretical Rz
skills.description: Theoretical Rz. Equation: Rz = f² / (8 × r)

skills.name: Formula: Actual Ra
skills.description: Actual Ra. Equation: Ra_act = Ra_th × Kv × Kf × Kw

skills.name: Formula: Rt from Rz
skills.description: Rt from Rz. Equation: Rt ≈ 1.1 × Rz

skills.name: Formula: Rq from Ra
skills.description: Rq from Ra. Equation: Rq ≈ 1.25 × Ra

skills.name: Formula: Scallop Height
skills.description: Scallop Height. Equation: h = r × (1 - cos(arcsin(s/(2r))))

skills.name: Formula: Tool Deflection
skills.description: Tool Deflection. Equation: δt = Fc × L³ / (3×E×I)

skills.name: Formula: Workpiece Deflection
skills.description: Workpiece Deflection. Equation: δw = F × L³ / (48×E×I)

skills.name: Formula: Combined Deflection
skills.description: Combined Deflection. Equation: δ_total = δt + δw + δf

skills.name: Formula: Stiffness Ratio
skills.description: Stiffness Ratio. Equation: K = F / δ

skills.name: Formula: Cutting Power
skills.description: Cutting Power. Equation: Pc = Fc × Vc / 60000

skills.name: Formula: Spindle Power
skills.description: Spindle Power. Equation: Ps = Pc / η

skills.name: Formula: Feed Power
skills.description: Feed Power. Equation: Pf = Ff × Vf / 60000

skills.name: Formula: Total Power
skills.description: Total Power. Equation: P = Pc + Pf

skills.name: Formula: Specific Power
skills.description: Specific Power. Equation: Ps = P / MRR

skills.name: Formula: Motor Power
skills.description: Motor Power. Equation: Pm = Ps × SF

skills.name: Formula: Chip Load
skills.description: Chip Load. Equation: fz = Vf / (N × z)

skills.name: Formula: Average Chip Thickness
skills.description: Average Chip Thickness. Equation: hm = fz × sin(θ) × √(ae/D)

skills.name: Formula: Max Chip Thickness
skills.description: Max Chip Thickness. Equation: hex = fz × sin(θ)

skills.name: Formula: Chip Cross Section
skills.description: Chip Cross Section. Equation: Ac = f × ap

skills.name: Formula: MRR
skills.description: MRR. Equation: Q = Vc × f × ap

skills.name: Formula: PSO Velocity
skills.description: PSO Velocity. Equation: v = w×v + c1×r1×(pbest-x) + c2×r2×(gbest-x)

skills.name: Formula: GA Fitness
skills.description: GA Fitness. Equation: f(x) = Σ(wi × fi(x))

skills.name: Formula: Gradient Descent
skills.description: Gradient Descent. Equation: x_new = x_old - α × ∇f(x)

skills.name: Formula: Bayesian Acquisition
skills.description: Bayesian Acquisition. Equation: α(x) = µ(x) + κ×σ(x)

skills.name: Formula: Pareto Dominance
skills.description: Pareto Dominance. Equation: x₁ ≺ x₂ iff ∀i: f_i(x₁) ≤ f_i(x₂)

skills.name: Formula: Objective Function
skills.description: Objective Function. Equation: min f(x) = cost + penalty

skills.name: Formula: Learning Rate Decay
skills.description: Learning Rate Decay. Equation: α_t = α₀ / (1 + decay×t)

skills.name: Formula: Adam Optimizer
skills.description: Adam Optimizer. Equation: m_t, v_t → θ update

skills.name: Formula: Weighted Sum
skills.description: Weighted Sum. Equation: F = Σ(wi × fi(x))

skills.name: Formula: Confidence Interval
skills.description: Confidence Interval. Equation: CI = µ ± z × σ/√n

skills.name: Formula: Evidence Score
skills.description: Evidence Score. Equation: E = Σ(level × weight)

skills.name: Formula: Quality Index
skills.description: Quality Index. Equation: QI = Ω × (1 - defects/total)

skills.name: Formula: Bayesian Update
skills.description: Bayesian Update. Equation: P(H|E) = P(E|H)×P(H) / P(E)

skills.name: Formula: Error Rate
skills.description: Error Rate. Equation: err = |actual - predicted| / actual

skills.name: Formula: Drift Detection
skills.description: Drift Detection. Equation: drift = |µ_new - µ_old| / σ

skills.name: Formula: Model Accuracy
skills.description: Model Accuracy. Equation: acc = correct / total
